General.Name: Polychem Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT. Polychem Indonesia Tbk engages in the chemical and polyester businesses in Indonesia, Asia, and Europe. The company operates through Polyester and Petrochemical segments. It offers mono-ethylene glycol, di-ethylene glycol, tri-ethylene glycol, and various ethoxylate products; and petrochemicals. The company also provides polyester chips, partially oriented yarns, polyester staple fibers, and drawn textured yarns. PT. Polychem Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Gedung Wisma 46 Kota BNI, Jakarta, Indonesia, 10220
